project.description: 03-july-17. Removed the test execution as we are facing different intermittent test failures everytime which may pass in individual run/with high memory machine

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
workspace_dir=`pwd`
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="tomcat" published_version="8.5.29"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi
# Install dependencies sudo zypper update -y && sudo zypper install -y wget git tar java-1_8_0-openjdk-devel make gcc
#Build OpenSSL cd $workspace_dir rm -rf openssl git clone git://github.com/openssl/openssl.git && cd openssl && git checkout OpenSSL_1_1_0 && \ ./config --prefix=/usr --openssldir=/usr/local/openssl shared && \ make && \ sudo make install
#Install Ant cd $workspace_dir rm -rf apache-ant-1.9.6 apache-ant-1.9.6-bin.tar.gz wget http://archive.apache.org/dist/ant/binaries/apache-ant-1.9.6-bin.tar.gz tar -zxvf apache-ant-1.9.6-bin.tar.gz
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib64/jvm/java export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version export ANT_HOME=$workspace_dir/apache-ant-1.9.6 export PATH=$PATH:$ANT_HOME/bin
#Build Tomcat cd $workspace_dir rm -rf tomcat85 git clone git://github.com/apache/tomcat85.git cd tomcat85 git checkout TOMCAT_8_5_29 cp build.properties.default build.properties ant
# test ant test 2>&1 | tee -a test.log
#Start server export CATALINA_HOME=$workspace_dir/tomcat85/output/build export PATH=$PATH:$CATALINA_HOME/bin cd $CATALINA_HOME/bin sh catalina.sh start
sleep 300s
#Verification of output rm -rf index.html wget http://127.0.0.1:8080/
if grep -q "Apache Tomcat/8.5.29" "index.html"; then sh catalina.sh stop exit 0 else exit 1 fi
